tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
tool.command:
bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
## Default section #if $sec_default.output: --output "${sec_default.output}" #end if #if str($sec_default.select_output_type) != "__none__": --output-type "${sec_default.select_output_type}" #end if #set values_sec_default_regions = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.regions_repeat]) #if $values_sec_default_regions: --regions "${values_sec_default_regions}" #end if #if $sec_default.regions_file: --regions-file "${sec_default.regions_file}" #end if #set values_sec_default_samples = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.samples_repeat]) #if $values_sec_default_samples: --samples "${values_sec_default_samples}" #end if #if $sec_default.samples_file: --samples-file "${sec_default.samples_file}" #end if #set values_sec_default_targets = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.targets_repeat]) #if $values_sec_default_targets: --targets "${values_sec_default_targets}" #end if #if $sec_default.targets_file: --targets-file "${sec_default.targets_file}" #end if ${sec_default.keep_alts} #set values_sec_default_format_fields = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.format_fields_repeat]) #if $values_sec_default_format_fields: --format-fields "${values_sec_default_format_fields}" #end if #if $sec_default.gvcf: --gvcf "${sec_default.gvcf}" #end if ${sec_default.insert_missed} ${sec_default.keep_masked_ref} #if $sec_default.skip_variants: --skip-variants "${sec_default.skip_variants}" #end if ${sec_default.variants_only} ${sec_default.consensus_caller} #if $sec_default.constrain: --constrain "${sec_default.constrain}" #end if ${sec_default.multiallelic_caller} #if $sec_default.novel_rate: --novel-rate "${sec_default.novel_rate}" #end if #if $sec_default.pval_threshold: --pval-threshold "${sec_default.pval_threshold}" #end if #if $sec_default.prior: --prior "${sec_default.prior}" #end if ${sec_default.chromosome_X} ${sec_default.chromosome_Y}

param.help: PED file or a file with optional second column for ploidy (0, 1 or 2) [all samples]
param.label: Samples File
param.name: samples_file

param.help: keep all possible alternate alleles at variant sites
param.label: Keep Alts
param.name: keep_alts

param.help: output gVCF blocks of homozygous REF calls
param.label: Gvcf
param.name: gvcf

param.help: output also sites missed by mpileup but present in -T
param.label: Insert Missed
param.name: insert_missed

param.help: keep sites with masked reference allele (REF=N)
param.label: Keep Masked Ref
param.name: keep_masked_ref

param.help: alternative model for multiallelic and rare-variant calling (conflicts with -c)
param.label: Multiallelic Caller
param.name: multiallelic_caller

param.help: likelihood of novel mutation for constrained trio calling, see man page for details
param.label: Novel Rate
param.name: novel_rate

param.help: mutation rate (use bigger for greater sensitivity)
param.label: Prior
param.name: prior

param.help: haploid output for male samples (requires PED file with -s)
param.label: Chromosome X
param.name: chromosome_X

param.help: haploid output for males and skips females (requires PED file with -s)
param.label: Chromosome Y
param.name: chromosome_Y

tool.help: SNP/indel variant calling from VCF/BCF. To be used in conjunction with samtools mpileup. This command replaces the former "bcftools view" caller. Some of the original functionality has been temporarily lost in the process of transition to htslib, but will be added back on popular demand. The original calling model can be invoked with the -c option.
